title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama’s official CLI and server for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally with one command.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama API—chat, generate, pull, push, list, delete models from Node or browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, stream, embed, pull, push models with a few lines of code.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration letting you use any Ollama model as an LLM or chat backend in LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-style interface) with multi-model support, file uploads, RAG and admin panel.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; generate, chat, pull, list models with fluent builder API.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem for interacting with the Ollama API; chat, generate, embed, manage models.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Enhanced interactive CLI for Ollama with conversation history, syntax highlighting and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style inline suggestions and chat panel.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and autoscaling.

title: ollama-chatbot
summary: Minimal React chatbot example that streams responses from a local Ollama model via the ollama-js client.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama supporting chat, generate, embeddings and model management in C#.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration that uses Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack NLP pipelines.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker image and compose examples for running Ollama server and web UI containers.

title: ollama-rag
summary: FastAPI service performing retrieval-augmented generation using Ollama for local LLM and Chroma for embeddings.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that streams responses from Ollama models in chat channels using slash commands.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app integrating Ollama models into Slack threads with streaming support and role-based access.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds a local AI assistant sidebar powered by any Ollama model.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package providing TypeScript/JavaScript bindings to the Ollama HTTP API.

title: ollama-pypi
summary: Official PyPI package for interacting with Ollama from Python; chat, generate, pull, push, embed.
